docs.text: it used to be that not just anyone could become a vampire .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: usually , you had to be an aristocrat - a count such as dracula or karnstein .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to qualify , you'd have to have a modicum of sophistication , so you'd at least look cool - or suave - when biting into some young damsel's throat .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but today , in our overly politically correct world , any scuzzy-looking , long-haired , unshaven lout or any spiked-haired harridans can put the bite on you .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: by the same token , to be a vampire hunter , one had to have some sort of medical training and knowledge of the occult or maybe perhaps be some sort of professional soldier , or at least one who retired with honors .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: not in these times .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: all you need are some sharp weapons , some bullets forged from silver and any yahoo can be a buffy - or a blade .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: without sounding elitist , the fear of vampires has greatly diminished because of this lack of exclusivity .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: which brings us to blade , the latest in a long line of vampire movies in which , it seems , half the population is putting the bite on the other half .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: not only are there thousands of vampires , but they seem to move from city to city , pay off police departments and , most importantly , establish their own exclusive after-hours raves in which the highlight is the sprinkler system going off and dousing all the occupants in a blood shower .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: with all that blood , you wonder why they have to hunt for victims .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: you also wonder when they get the time to get their clothes dry-cleaned and why no cleaner ever complains about all the bloodstains .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: blade , which is based on a marvel comic book character , is , like a comic book , all visual .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot is basically blade repetitiously slashing his way through the vampire army seeking their leader , deacon frost .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's all hokum and nonsense , of course .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but the filmmakers play it straight .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: unfortunately , at least at the advance screening i attended , the audience didn't see it that way and laughed through much of the proceedings .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: you know a movie is in trouble when the scenes of blood and gore that should elicit screams of fright instead evoke peels of laughter .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: another tell-tale sign is when the audience seems to be admiring the hero's costume more than the hero .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: also it seems it's not enough for today's vampire merely to have fangs .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he must also be proficient in the martial arts .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: why a supernatural being , one of the undead , needs such skills is beyond me .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: ( of course , this concept dates to the 1974 hammer films-run run shaw production of legend of the seven golden vampires , in which dracula is defeated by seven karate-chopping siblings . )
docs.label: negative

docs.text: wesley snipes is buff as blade .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he growls his lines -the few he has - and spends most of the time glowering - as if he was suffering from indigestion or having second thoughts about starring in and co-producing this turkey .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: blade is just another example of how the vampire film , a once honorable member of the horror family , has gone downhill .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this dud mostly makes you yearn for those quaint old days when christopher lee could be stopped just by dangling a crucifix in his face .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: today's vampires lack the panache , the style of a bela lugosi or a christopher lee .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they are not even worthy enough to carry those great bloodsuckers' capes .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: they are more farcical than frightful .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this whole enterprise is one dull blade that could have used lots of sharpening .
docs.label: negative
